main_definition: Christmas is a holiday celebrated annually by billions of people around the world, commemorating the birth of Jesus Christ.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A festive celebration that occurs on December 25th each year
meanings_and_examples.example: We decorated our Christmas tree and exchanged gifts with family.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The traditional meal eaten during the Christmas holiday
meanings_and_examples.example: For dinner, we enjoyed roast turkey, ham, mashed potatoes, and cranberry sauce.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A time for giving and receiving gifts
meanings_and_examples.example: My family always exchanges presents on Christmas morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A day off from work or school to celebrate the holiday
meanings_and_examples.example: I didn't have any classes on Christmas Day, so I spent the day relaxing at home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity for people to gather with loved ones and share joyous moments
meanings_and_examples.example: We went caroling around our neighborhood as part of our Christmas celebration.
